channel.title: Kubernetes on od-stack
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on od-stack

item.title: Kubernetes - How It Fits Together (K8s series - 6)
item.description: How pods leverage Linux namespaces to share environments between containers, plus a look at the Kubelet and Kube-proxy.

item.title: Kubernetes Control Plane (K8s series - 5)
item.description: How the Kubernetes control plane works — etcd, the API server, controllers, and the scheduler.

item.title: Low and High Level Container Runtimes (K8s series - 4)
item.description: Hands-on exploration of low-level container runtimes (cgroups, namespaces, runc) and high-level runtimes (Docker, containerd).

item.title: Container Runtimes (K8s series - 3)
item.description: What container runtimes are, the role of OCI standards, and the distinction between high-level and low-level runtimes.

item.title: Containers (K8s series - 2)
item.description: A deep dive into what Linux containers actually are — namespaces, cgroups, and how they differ from virtual machines.

item.title: Hello Kubernetes (K8s series - 1)
item.description: An introduction to Kubernetes — what it is, how deployments evolved from physical servers to containers, and why container orchestration matters.
